mdRecord.dcterms:description: An accumulation of photographs and prints held by Special Collections, featuring the following categories: the Rotunda, University of Virginia Faculty, University of Virginia Students, University of Virginia Athletics, and University of Virginia General (buildings, events, student activities, etc.)

Additionally, this accession includes images from the People prints file (non-U.Va. people), the University News Services, the Office of the Provost, the Claude Moore Health Sciences Library, the Law Library, and Development Communications.
Some News Office folders contain additional photographs, contact sheets and negatives not noted on the online database.
Exhibited August 14, 2017 - June 23, 2018 â€” The University of Virginia in 100 Objects, Small Special Collections Library (Student Sketch of Maximilian Schele de Vere)
